Clk0
PC=000000 IR=10100000 R1=00000000 R2=00000000 R3=00000000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 10100000 means initR1; R1=0
After Execution: R1=00000000

Clk1
PC=000001 IR=10100001 R1=00000000 R2=00000000 R3=00000000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 10100001 means initR2; R2=0
After Execution: R2=00000000

Clk2
PC=000010 IR=10100010 R1=00000000 R2=00000000 R3=00000000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 10100010 means initR3; R3=0
After Execution: R3=00000000

Clk3
PC=000011 IR=10100011 R1=00000000 R2=00000000 R3=00000000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 10100011 means initR4; R4=0
After Execution: R4=00000000

Clk4
PC=000100 IR=11000001 R1=00000000 R2=00000000 R3=00000000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 11000001 means ld1; R1 = [0]
After Execution: R1=00010000

Clk5
PC=000101 IR=11000010 R1=00010000 R2=00000000 R3=00000000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 11000010 means ld2; R2 = [0]
After Execution: R2=00010000

Clk6
PC=000110 IR=11000011 R1=00010000 R2=00010000 R3=00000000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 11000011 means ld3; R3 = [0]
After Execution: R3=00010000

Clk7
PC=000111 IR=10000000 R1=00010000 R2=00010000 R3=00010000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 10000000 means add; R3 = R2 + R3
After Execution: R3=00100000

Clk8
PC=001000 IR=10000001 R1=00010000 R2=00010000 R3=00100000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 10000001 means adds; if carry, R4=R4+1
After Execution: R4=00000000

Clk9
PC=001001 IR=10001001 R1=00010000 R2=00010000 R3=00100000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 10001001 means dec; R1=R1-1
After Execution: R1=00001111

Clk10
PC=001010 IR=01001000 R1=00001111 R2=00010000 R3=00100000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 01001000 means br1; if R1!=1, PC=PC-4
After Execution: PC=000111

Clk11
PC=000111 IR=10000000 R1=00001111 R2=00010000 R3=00100000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 10000000 means add; R3 = R2 + R3
After Execution: R3=00110000

Clk12
PC=001000 IR=10000001 R1=00001111 R2=00010000 R3=00110000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 10000001 means adds; if carry, R4=R4+1
After Execution: R4=00000000

Clk13
PC=001001 IR=10001001 R1=00001111 R2=00010000 R3=00110000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 10001001 means dec; R1=R1-1
After Execution: R1=00001110

Clk14
PC=001010 IR=01001000 R1=00001110 R2=00010000 R3=00110000 R4=00000000 CF=0
Instruction 01001000 means br1; if R1!=1, PC=PC-4
After Execution: PC=000111

Clk15

After Execution: R3=01000000

Clk67
PC=001011 IR=11100001 R1=00000001 R2=00010000 R3=00000000 R4=00000001 CF=1
Instruction 11100001 means st1; [1] = R4
After Execution: [1]=00000001

Clk68
PC=001100 IR=11100010 R1=00000001 R2=00010000 R3=00000000 R4=00000001 CF=1
Instruction 11100001 means st2; [2] = R3
After Execution: [2]=00000000

Clk69
PC=001101 IR=00000000 R1=00000001 R2=00010000 R3=00000000 R4=00000001 CF=1
Instruction 00XXXXXX means halt
End of execution; Total # of dynamic instructions: 69
